application.doc: Retrieving personal certificate names and details in a certificate database

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve personal certificate names and details
method.doc: To complete the operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the SSL Certificates personal certificate resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc:
200 ok
[ { "id": "cert_name", "default":true/false, "version":"cert_version", "issuer":"cert_issuer", "suject":"cert_subject", "notbefore":"date", "notbefore_epoch":"seconds", "notafter":"date", "notafter_epoch":"seconds", "serial_number":"serial number of the certificate" "keysize":"the key size of the certificate" "sha1_fingerprint":"the SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate" "signature_algorithm":"the signature algorithm used to create this cert" }, { "id": "cert_name2", "default":true/false, "version":"cert_version", "issuer":"cert_issuer", "suject":"cert_subject", "notbefore":"date", "notbefore_epoch":"seconds", "notafter":"date". "notafter_epoch":"seconds", "serial_number":"serial number of the certificate" "keysize":"the key size of the certificate" "sha1_fingerprint":"the SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate" "signature_algorithm":"the signature algorithm used to create this cert" }, { .... } ]

representation.name: retrievePersonalCertNameDetailsJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: default
param.doc: Whether this personal certificate is default. Valid values are "true" or "false".

param.name: notbefore
param.doc: Start date of the personal certificate validity.

param.name: notbefore_epoch
param.doc: The number of seconds since epoch at which the certificate will become valid.

param.name: notafter
param.doc: Expire date of the personal certificate validity.

param.name: notafter_epoch
param.doc: The number of seconds since epoch at which the certificate will become valid.

param.name: serial_number
param.doc: The serial number of the certificate.

param.name: keysize
param.doc: Key size of the personal certificate.

param.name: sha1_fingerprint
param.doc: The SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate.

param.name: signature_algorithm
param.doc: The signature algorithm used to create the certificate.
